description: It was friendship and passion for Japanese cuisine that prompted two young business partners to open this quiet, welcoming restaurant in the heart of Bologna. Situated in a courtyard with medieval origins, Seta Sushi Restaurant has a modern bistro-style dining room, as well as plenty of outdoor space for summer dining. The menu features an impressive selection of traditional Japanese dishes with the occasional personalised touch, all made from top-quality ingredients. Don’t worry if you’re new to Japanese cuisine – Maurilio is front of house to offer guests friendly, expert advice on both food and beverage. The latter includes a choice of sake for those wishing to immerse themselves fully in the Japanese dining experience.
